title: Server Configuration
description: Schema for local dev server runtime configuration and live-reload settings.

liveReload.description: Live reload related settings (env overrides also available).

debounceMs.description: Debounce window (ms) for coalescing file change events.

ignoredPaths.description: Glob-like path fragments to ignore from triggering reloads.

watchRoot.description: If true, the server will watch the repository root in addition to config paths.
